name: The Refine Institute
overview:
One of the leading cosmetic surgery institutions in the US, The Refine Institute is committed to providing topnotch aesthetic services to its clients. The company enlists the services of Dr. Broc Pratt, one of the most recognized talents in the cosmetic surgery industry. Utilizing a three-tiered process–Core Consultation, High Tech/Less Invasive, and Technique Expertise–The Refine Institute covers 360 degrees of the whole patient satisfaction experience–from the consultation to the operation to the maintenance treatment.

In addition to specializing in Body Contouring, Facial Sculpting, Breast Aesthetics, and other cosmetic surgery programs, The Refine Institute also offers a wide selection of top-of-the-line skin care products medically proven and carefully chosen to be consistent with the company’s high standards.

More information about the Institute, Dr. Pratt, and the company’s products and services are available at http://www.refineinstitute.com/.
